ygData.subject: Re: Cams
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a character that has a 195 Fletching and made him some cams said these do not combine.....  Guess that means no, haven t tried since last patch though.

-----Original Message-----
From: MadGrizzle [mailto:MadGrizzle@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 8:34 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Cams

From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>

Has anyone had success combining tinkered cams to create a cammed bow? The
"Apprentice Guide" told me to try and let me know if they didn't
work. Well, I'm not Level 16 yet and don't want to try to make the cams
until I can get experience from it and know that they would combine. Geez,
these gears are expensive, anyone know if they can be forged or something!
